channel.title: When logging out
channel.description:
Hey, I want to fix this this error i guess you would call it, when a person logs off my server on the run.bat this comes up
** END NESTED EXCEPTION ** Last packet sent to the server was 93 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) at SQL.createConnection(SQL.java:14) at SQL.query(SQL.java:31) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:52) at client.logout(client.java:11457) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:380) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:372) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:286) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at SQL.query(SQL.java:26) at SQL.saveHighScore(SQL.java:52) at client.logout(client.java:11457) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:380) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:372) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:286) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at SQL.destroyConnection(SQL.java:39) at client.logout(client.java:11458) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:380) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:372) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:286) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
after they click "log off" it takes about 30 seconds for the player to successfully log out. help please I'll Rep

item.title: When logging out
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“mikexd5, post:7, topic:365164”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=461369.msg3375324#msg3375324 date=1287549784]
let me guess, does this happen after you did the highscores tutorial or any sql tutorial?
this happens when you did the tutorial incorrectly and the server cant really identify the sql change you made, because its not setup right, so you get this error thrown at you, either fix the mysql error or completely take out the mysql highscores or whatever sql change you made
[/quote]

mine does how do i fix this…[/quote]
Dude… seriously? But just so you wont gravedig any topics…

  1. You’ll have to comment out all lines regarding SQL, with this “//” but doing that would cripple some features like lets say npc/char loading, etc.
  2. You will have to connect to the databases/SQL correctly.
  3. New source.

You pick

Read full topic
